name: Meatfestation
description:
Meatfestation is a Top-Down 2D horror game where you play as a young boy in an abandoned, meat-infested house, looking for your lost sister.

Controls:
WASD - To Move
Left Shift - To Sprint
Left Click - To Throw Flashlight
F - To Turn Flashlight On and Off

Your Sanity Meter at the top of the screen will deplete over time. When the meter empties, you will go insane and the game will be over...

You have a limited number of flashlights to throw at enemies displayed at the top right of the screen.

You can hide behind highlighted furniture so enemies temporarily stop chasing you.

Meatfestation is a Proof of Concept made in 3.5 weeks for Major Studio Fall.

The Meat Team:
Kimari - Project Manager, Programmer, and  Audio designer
